name: Bhineka
description:
He have special perspective about whats the signifation about our national culture, as we know that its 'bhineka' or harmony in the diversity. When one keeps  dominant, fanatics, predominant, intelectual or any other kind of society distance from the other.

He become keenly aware that become a part of indonesians society does not proceed by axiological purity (dwight conquergood), but how we can keep our wisdom in a differnt way to make it look plural. Wearing this outfit, a combination from javanes shirt batik, udeng (kind of headband with batik motif) and bunak's shawl, all combined like construction bhineka its self.
